* Shader used to draw a bitmap as a texture. The bitmap can be repeated or
 * mirrored by setting the tiling mode.

methods.name: private static native long nativeCreate(long nativeMatrix, long bitmapHandle, int shaderTileModeX, int shaderTileModeY)
